pages.text: $(li)The Seed Pouch is a new item that can store up to 10 stacks of any seed in it.$(br)$(li)To add seeds, grab the seed you want to add in your inventory, and right click it onto the pouch.

$(li)You can then right click the pouch to take a stack of seeds out.$(br2)The Seed Pouch has other features included:$(br)$(li)Right clicking the pouch onto farmable soil will plant the seed. Shift-right clicking plants a 3x3$(br)$(li)Holding the seed pouch in either hand will have picked up seeds of that type go directly in the bag.
$(li)If the Usage Ticker feature is enabled, it'll show how many seeds you have left
